feed.title: TasmoAdmin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for TasmoAdmin: v4.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update FR translations by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1158
  • Bump phpunit/phpunit from 10.5.17 to 10.5.19 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1156
  • Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.10.66 to 1.10.67 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1155
  • Bump friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer from 3.53.0 to 3.54.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1154
  • Add corrections to language files en and fr by @kilkenny44 in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1157
  • Customise default port of Tasmota by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1159
  • Add PHP 8.3 to CI for tests by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1160
  • Bump node from 20.10.0 to 20.12.2 by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1161
  • Bump alpine linux from 3.18 -> 3.19 by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1162
  • Bump PHP to 8.3 in Docker image + default CI by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1163
  • Bump symfony/http-foundation from 6.4.4 to 6.4.7 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1168
  • Bump symfony/filesystem from 6.4.6 to 6.4.7 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1166
  • Bump symfony/css-selector from 6.4.3 to 6.4.7 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1165
  • Bump symfony/browser-kit from 6.4.3 to 6.4.7 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1164
  • Bump symfony/http-client from 6.4.6 to 6.4.7 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1167
  • Port addition left over + device prop to bool by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1169

New Contributors

  • @kilkenny44 made their first contribution in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1157

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/compare/v4.0.2...v4.1.0

entry.title: New release for TasmoAdmin: v4.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve release pipeline by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1170

  • Bump esbuild-sass-plugin from 3.2.0 to 3.3.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1179

  • Bump prettier from 3.2.5 to 3.3.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1187
  • Bump esbuild from 0.20.2 to 0.21.4 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1188
  • Bump friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer from 3.57.2 to 3.58.1 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1190

entry.content:

entry.title: New release for TasmoAdmin: v4.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump nodejs to 20.16.0 by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1224
  • Add docker dev target by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1225
  • Bump friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer from 3.59.3 to 3.63.1 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1236
  • Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.11.7 to 1.11.11 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1233
  • Increase upload to 5MB by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1237
  • Bump esbuild from 0.23.0 to 0.23.1 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1232
  • Bump glob from 10.4.1 to 11.0.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1215
  • Fix wrong format error by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1238
  • Bump compare-versions from 6.1.0 to 6.1.1 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1216
  • Bump composer/semver from 3.4.0 to 3.4.2 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1219
  • Bump guzzlehttp/guzzle from 7.8.1 to 7.9.2 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1223
  • Bump @fortawesome/fontawesome-free from 6.5.2 to 6.6.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1217

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/compare/v4.1.2...v4.1.3

entry.title: New release for TasmoAdmin: v4.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.11.11 to 1.12.6 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1248
  • Move client to be configurable by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1249
  • Bump friendsofphp/php-cs-fixer from 3.63.1 to 3.64.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1239
  • Bump mikey179/vfsstream from 1.6.11 to 1.6.12 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1241
  • Bump filp/whoops from 2.15.4 to 2.16.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1246
  • Bump esbuild from 0.23.1 to 0.24.0 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1243
  • Bump composer/semver from 3.4.2 to 3.4.3 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1244
  • Fix copy for config by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1250
  • Bump phpstan/phpstan from 1.12.6 to 1.12.7 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1251
  • Tidy Sonoff Class by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1253
  • Remove redundant version from docker-compose by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1254
  • Control request concurrency by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1255
  • Bump nodejs to 20.18.0 by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1256
  • Bump alpine to 3.20 by @inverse in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1257
  • Bump symfony/http-foundation from 6.4.8 to 6.4.14 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1261
  • Bump symfony/http-client from 6.4.8 to 6.4.14 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1259
  • Bump symfony/process from 6.4.8 to 6.4.14 in /tasmoadmin by @dependabot in https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/pull/1260

Full Changelog: https://github.com/TasmoAdmin/TasmoAdmin/compare/v4.1.3...v4.2.0
